name: Zip Zoom
description:
Help Zip navigate the tricky floors to climb the tower!  Use the cursor to rotate the floor and when it's ready, give Zip the go ahead to race to the stairs!  There are 10 stages for the Jam version, can you beat them all!

Made in 48 hours for the GM48-32 available here: https://gm48.net/game/1384/zip-zoom
